author: dkulp
msg: Make sure conduits degrade to URLConnection of if the async stuff is shutdown.

author: rhillegas
msg: DERBY-672: Attempt to fix test order problem on Java 7 on Sol32.

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-232: creating of loadable/detachable models w.r.t transactions
The loadable/detachable model (eg EntityModel) should only be created
after the transaction has been executed (all changes flushed).
This fix addresses this for the invocation of actions.

author: suresh
msg: HDFS-3833. TestDFSShell fails on windows due to concurrent file read/write. Contributed by Brandon Li

author: danhaywood
msg: ISIS-14: fixes for persistence by reachability in JDO
- 1<->m adding child to parent with child being transient; preDirty logic firing
- avoid double persistence of object if has been persisted by DataNucleus' persistence-by-reachability algorithm
